meanings.definition: Constructed or built by a mason.
meanings.sent1: The masoned wall stood strong against the wind.
meanings.sent2: The house had a beautiful masoned fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The masoned path through the garden was a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her masoned heart protected her from getting hurt easily.
meanings.sent5: The masoned bridge connected the two sides of the river seamlessly.

meanings.definition: Fitted or joined together like masonry.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle pieces were masoned together perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The masoned stones formed a sturdy foundation.
meanings.sent3: The masoned curtains added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were masoned together in a clear pattern.
meanings.sent5: The masoned pieces of the jigsaw puzzle fit snugly into place.
